flavorText: The life of a shapeshifter is one of constant change.

foreignData.flavorText: Das Leben eines Gestaltwandlers ist ständigem Wandel unterworfen.
foreignData.name: Spiegelbild
foreignData.text: Du kannst das Spiegelbild als Kopie einer beliebigen Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, ins Spiel kommen lassen.

foreignData.flavorText: La vida de un metamorfo es un cambio continuo.
foreignData.name: Imagen reflejada
foreignData.text: Puedes hacer que la Imagen reflejada entre al campo de batalla como una copia de cualquier criatura que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText: La vie d'un changeforme est une transformation perpétuelle.
foreignData.name: Image miroir
foreignData.text: Vous pouvez faire que l'Image miroir arrive sur le champ de bataille comme une copie de n'importe quelle créature que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText: La vita di un polimorfo è in continuo cambiamento.
foreignData.name: Immagine Riflessa
foreignData.text: Puoi far entrare l'Immagine Riflessa nel campo di battaglia come una copia di qualsiasi creatura che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText: 多相の戦士の人生は目まぐるしく変わる。
foreignData.name: 鏡像
foreignData.text: あなたは鏡像を、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体のコピーとして戦場に出してもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 多相の戦士

foreignData.name: 거울상
foreignData.text: 당신은 거울상이 당신이 조종하는 아무 생물의 복사본으로 전장에 들어오도록 할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: A vida de um metamorfo é de mudança constante.
foreignData.name: Imagem Espelhada
foreignData.text: Você pode fazer com que Imagem Espelhada entre no campo de batalha como cópia de qualquer criatura que você controle.

foreignData.name: Зеркальный Образ
foreignData.text: Вы можете заставить Зеркальный Образ выйти на поле битвы в качестве копии любого существа под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText: 变形兽的生活也在一直变化。
foreignData.name: 镜身影
foreignData.text: 你可以使镜身影当成任一由你操控之生物的复制品来进入战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 變形獸的生活也在一直變化。
foreignData.name: 鏡身影
foreignData.text: 你可以使鏡身影當成任一由你操控之生物的複製品來進入戰場。

name: Mirror Image
originalText: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature you control.

rulings.text: Mirror Image copies exactly what was printed on the original creature (unless that creature is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn’t copy whether that creature is tapped or untapped, whether it as any counters on it or any Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If the chosen creature is copying something else (for example, if the chosen creature is another Mirror Image), then Mirror Image enters the battlefield as whatever the chosen creature copied.

If the chosen creature is a token, Mirror Image copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put the token onto the battlefield. Mirror Image doesn’t become a token in this case.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when Mirror Image enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.
If Mirror Image somehow enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, it can’t become a copy of that creature. You may choose only a creature that’s already on the battlefield.

text: You may have Mirror Image enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control.
